## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4d12d4e4388bdfd37673aa9e4527d481312b56703325b9cc938f22cac268f25e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@vf-org/smapi-js-core' @ 8.2.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
